extendedInfo.description: Confused by "Unknown Artist - Track 01" names of your favorite songs? Just run Trackognito, browse, select and get all these tracks named.* Lite version allows to recognize five tracks * Powered by The EchoNest music recognition engine* Supported formats: MP3, WAV, MP4, M4A* Supports MP3 tags (ID3v1, ID3v2)* No banner advertisements* Languages: English, PolishTips:* When a song not recognized try once more a moment later. Sometimes EchoNest server needs to think a little longer * Tap Back button to leave tutorial* Trackognito works better with broadband Internet* When "EchoNest limit exceeded" message appears let us know and try recognition later* Media scanner runs after closing Trackognito to update song list for music players supportExplanation of requested permissions: MODIFY/DELETE USB STORAGE CONTENTS MODIFY/DELETE SD CARD CONTENTSUsed to change file names when song recognizedFULL INTERNET ACCESSUsed to communicate with EchoNest server for song recognitionVIEW WI-FI STATEUsed to allow usage through WI-FIVIEW NETWORK STATEUsed to detect when internet access is availableTags: recognize identify song track music sound Trackognito
